fko.tetris

Class TetrisGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • fko.tetris.TetrisGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer

    public class TetrisGame
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer
    This represents the state of a Tetris game. It holds all information necessary to represent a Tetris game at any point in time.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TetrisGame()
      Creates a Tetris game with default values
      TetrisGame(int startLevel)
